org.apache.cassandra.db

Class CounterColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.Column
      • org.apache.cassandra.db.CounterColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnDiskAtom

    public class CounterColumn
extends Column
    A column that represents a partitioned counter.
